requirements: Discipline, persistence, and a responsible attitude toward work and clients
Willingness to work according to sales processes and targets
Team player with good communication skills
en.title: Sales Consultant – Telecommunications Package Sales in Shopping Centers
en.description: The role involves direct sales of telecommunications packages in shopping centers, where we help customers obtain better services at lower costs. The focus is on active selling, professional consulting, and achieving results.

responsibilities: Komunikativna, ambiciozna in rezultatsko usmerjena oseba
Močna želja po nadpovprečnem zaslužku in karierni rasti
Disciplina, vztrajnost in odgovoren odnos do dela in strank
Pripravljenost delati po prodajnih procesih in ciljih
Želja po učenju prodajnih veščin in osebnem razvoju
Izkušnje v prodaji so prednost, niso pa pogoj.
requirements: Ekipni igralec z dobrimi komunikacijskimi veščinami
sl.title: Prodajni svetovalec – Prodaja telekomunikacijskih paketov v nakupovalnih centrih
sl.description: Delo obsega neposredno prodajo telekomunikacijskih paketov v nakupovalnih centrih, kjer strankam pomagamo do boljših storitev in nižjih stroškov. Poudarek je na aktivni prodaji, strokovnem svetovanju in rezultatih.
